instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

definitions.820-2915: What is 820-2915? a LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER.
definitions.820-2914: What is 820-2914? a LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER.

threads.title: Strap 0084 to 0005
threads.message: I need to replace 0084 to 0005 with 4 vram minix. What resistors I should remove or add?

threads.title: Strap 0084 to 0005
threads.message: First try it without touching anything, if there are issues install <RESISTOR>R8613</RESISTOR>

threads.title: Strap 0084 to 0005
threads.message:
are we talking about <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-2915</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> or <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-2914</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>?

solution for 084 <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-2915</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> to  005 <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-2915</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> please?
(having a board with 084 originally and replaced with 005, got some video distortion now)

threads.title: Strap 0084 to 0005
threads.message: I installed <RESISTOR>R8613</RESISTOR> and same thing. Same thing before and after replacing the GPU.

threads.title: Strap 0084 to 0005
threads.message: "same thing" is a good description of a problem......
